catentdesc.name: Albini Dark Gray Wool Suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Dogtooth jacket in a soft, dark gray wool blend with front pockets and a ticket pocket with a flap. Four inner pockets, two with buttons, and a vent at the back. Pleated pants with a button, zip fly closure.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Dark Gray Suit
catentdesc.longdescription: A modern suit tailored from winter-weight wool features a fully lined jacket and lined flat-front trousers. The jacket has a three button closure, four button cuffs and flap pockets. Trousers have a zip fly with hook-and-button closure and open back pockets.

catentdesc.name: Albini Black Wool Suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Two button jacket with pleated trousers. Jacket and pants are fully lined. Made from 100% wool with silk lining. Features four pockets, straight leg pants with a button, zip fly closure.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Black Suit
catentdesc.shortdescription: Modern slim fitting black wool suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Trim fitting through the chest, armholes and sides. Impeccably tailored with a notched-lapel jacket and flat-front trousers. Trousers have zip fly with double hook-and-eye closure; split-waist construction.

catentdesc.name: Albini European Cut Chintz Wool Suit
catentdesc.shortdescription: Modern European cut, shiny chintz wool suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Glossy chintz wool accentuates the finish of this double-button jacket and flat-front trousers for a stylish, contemporary fit and appearance. Trousers have a zip fly with hook-and-button closure and back button-closure pockets.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Navy Blue Formal Suit
catentdesc.shortdescription: Relaxed cut traditional navy blue suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Relaxed cut. Jacket has peaked lapel and three interior pockets. Pants have zip fly with double hook-and-eye closure and are partially lined. Formal and refined for all special occasions.

catentdesc.name: Albini Executive Cut Gray Suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Crafted from a wool blend featuring a silk-lined jacket, with a center seam for easy tailoring, and unhemmed flat-front trousers. Trousers have a zip fly with hook-and-button closure and back button-closure pockets.

catentdesc.name: Albini Classic British Cut Black Suit
catentdesc.shortdescription: Classic British cut black wool suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Classic and restrained cool British style. Silk-lined wool suit featuring a contoured lapel jacket with outer pockets and classic flat-front trousers. Trousers have a button fly with snap-button closure and back button-closure pockets.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Black Skinny Suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Trendy style ultra slim fitting skinny suit. Double-flap pockets and a narrow lapel on the jacket. Slim, low-rise trousers keep the look sleek and contemporary. Trousers have split-seam pockets.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Black Contemporary Three Button Suit
catentdesc.shortdescription: Modern cut black three button suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Notched-lapel jacket and straight front trousers are crafted from a wrinkle free wool blend ideal for an active lifestyle that includes a lot of travel. Trousers have a zip fly with hook-and-button closure and back button-closure pockets.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Gray Traditional Three Button Suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Timeless styling defines this Italian-crafted, three-button suit detailed with satin trim along the waistband and sides of the triple-pleated trousers. Tonal backstitching outlines the jacket 's straight lapel. Trousers have a zip fly with hook-and-button closure and open back pockets.

catentdesc.name: Albini Contemporary Gray Pinstripe Suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Relaxed-fitting pinstripe suit includes a two-button jacket and sleek pleated trousers. Four interior pockets on the jacket offer a touch of organizational convenience. Trousers have a button fly with snap closure and back button-closure pockets.

catentdesc.name: Albini Dark Gray Slim Fit Wool Suit
catentdesc.shortdescription: Slim fitting dark gray wool suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Wool patterned with a mini check accentuates the slim silhouette. Seamed wide-lapel jacket and fitted pleated trousers create a clean and modern look. For a dapper touch, add an ascot to your ensemble.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Black Relaxed Fit Traditional Two Button Suit
catentdesc.shortdescription: Relaxed fit traditional cut two button suit
catentdesc.longdescription: A suit crafted from the finest polyester cotton blend. Features a rayon-lined jacket, with exposed seam for easy tailoring, and unhemmed pleated trousers. Trousers have a zip fly with snap closure and open back pockets.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Dark Gray Relaxed Fit Traditional Two Button Suit
catentdesc.shortdescription: Traditional cut two button dark gray suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Dark gray polyester cotton blend suit that pairs a two-button, notched-lapel jacket with flat front trousers. Five interior pockets on the jacket provide a surprising amount of covert storage. Trousers have a button fly with hook-and-button closure and back button-closure pockets.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Light Gray Slim Fit Contemporary Two Button Suit
catentdesc.shortdescription: Contemporary light gray slim fit suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Light gray polyester cotton blend slim fit suit that pairs a two-button, peaked lapel jacket with pleated trousers. Trousers have zip fly with button closure, slant pockets and open back pockets. A timeless lightweight summer suit.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Shiny Gray Slim Fit Disco Suit
catentdesc.shortdescription: Slim fit shiny gray disco suit
catentdesc.longdescription: Shiny finish and wrinkle free cotton polyester blend make this the perfect suit for the dance floor. Reinforced seams in the pant for added flexibility. Trousers have a button fly and open back pockets.
